climbs.name: Small Love In a World of Big

content.description:
The title is almost longer than the problem, but the movement, rock, and landing make it a worthwhile trip.

Sit start with a sloping left hand edge and a big right hand sidepull. From there, traverse left to a crimp, walk the feet over to a great heel hook, match hands, gain another left hand edge, pop to the lip, and mantel on top the boulder.
content.protection: A pad or none at all. The landing is perfect.
content.location:
Start just to the left of

Selected Ambient Work

on Ole's west face.

content.description: Sit start with a high right hand edge and a low left hand sloper-bump. From there, toe in, place a right heel hook, reach a right hand bump on the arete, follow to a great left hand edge, and continue up the remaining features to reach an easy mantel.
content.protection: A pad or two. It's a short problem, but the tree just to the right of the problem may present a fall risk.
content.location: It climbs the southwest arete of Ole.
